description_for_human: Browse and purchase AI-inspired streetwear from A-OK Shop (Apes on Keys). Nerd streetwear for AI junkies.
description_for_model: Access the A-OK Shop product catalog and create checkout sessions for AI-inspired streetwear merchandise. Use the Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP) to browse products, get detailed product information including variants and pricing, and initiate Stripe-powered checkout flows. You can create both hosted checkout sessions and direct payment intents. All products include detailed sizing charts, color options, and high-quality images.
